p: This new COVID-19 telemedicine system may increase diagnostic accuracy of difficult cases and improve treatment of severe or critical cases of COVID-19 for the large rural population of Western China at low cost; it has been highly praised by the WHO. This system may help explain why the CFR of COVID-19 is only 0.55% in Sichuan Province, which is much lower than the 4.64% in Hubei Province, China, and the mean rate of the world so far.
